These terms and conditions are agreed on the one hand by “PHOSPHENISM Publishing – Dr. Lefebure’s School” corporation with share capital of 16.800 euros whose head office is “30330 La Bastide d’Engras – FRANCE”, registered with the Trade and Companies SIRET : 339 614 463 00042 under the following number called “Dr. Lefebure’s School, 30330 La Bastide d’Engras – FRANCE” and on the other hand, by any person or entity wishing to make a purchase via the website “http://phosphenism.com” hereinafter “buyer”.

These conditions of sale define the contractual relationship between PHOSPHENISM Publishing and the buyer and the conditions applicable to all purchases made through the merchant site “PHOSPHENISM Publishing, 30330 La Bastide d’Engras – FRANCE, the buyer either professional or personal.
The acquisition of a good or service through this site implies acceptance by the buyer of these conditions of sale. These conditions shall prevail over any other general or special conditions not specifically approved by “PHOSPHENISM Publishing, 30330 La Bastide d’Engras – FRANCE”.

“PHOSPHENISM Publishing, 30330 La Bastide d’Engras – FRANCE” reserves the right to modify terms and conditions at any time. In this case, the applicable conditions are those in effect on the date of the order by the buyer.

Characteristics of goods and services

The products and services offered are those listed in the catalog published on the site “PHOSPHENISM Publishing, 30330 La Bastide d’Engras – FRANCE”. These products and services are offered within the limits of available stocks. Each product is accompanied by a description provided by the supplier; for some of them, labeled DF or SD, the buyer can access the vendor documentation. The photographs in the catalog are as accurate as possible but can not ensure a perfect similarity with the product, especially with regard to colors.

The prices listed in the catalog are final prices in $ taking in account the VAT applicable on the day of the order; any rate change will be reflected in the price of products or services.

PHOSPHENISM Publishing reserves the right to change prices at any time, it is understood however that only the prices listed in the catalog on the day of the order will apply to the buyer.

The prices include “or either do not include” the processing, transportation and delivery of the order if they occur in the geographical areas set out below.

Orders

The buyer, who wishes to buy a product or service must: complete the identification sheet on which he’ll provide all the data requested or give customer number if he owns one, complete the online order form in giving all the references of selected products or services, check and validate its order, make payment in accordance to the conditions of purchase, confirm its order and its payment.

The confirmation of the order implies acceptance of these terms of sale, recognition of having perfect knowledge of it and waiver of its own conditions of purchase or other conditions.

All datas recorded and registered confirmation are worth proofs of the transaction. Confirmation will be worth a signature and implies the agreement for transactions.

The seller will email confirmation of the order recorded.

Payment terms

The price is due at the order. Payments will be made by credit card; they will be made through the secure PayPal system which uses SSL “Secure Socket Layer” protocol so that the transmitted information is encrypted by software and no third party can take knowledge during transport over the network.

The buyer’s account will be debited only when shipping available products or services and only the amount for the products or services sent or downloaded.

At the request of the buyer, it will be sent a paper invoice showing VAT or either VAT not applicable.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Delivery

Deliveries are made to the address specified in the order that can only be in the area agreed.

Shipments are carried out on the account of and at the risk of the purchaser by the time the goods have left the premises. In case of damage during transportation, complaint must be made to the carrier within three days of delivery.

Delivery times are only given as an indication; if they exceed thirty days from the order, the sales contract may be terminated and the buyer get its refund.

Guarantee

All products supplied by the seller have the legal guarantee provided by Article 1641 of the French Civil Code.

Responsibility

The seller, in the online sales process is only bound by an obligation of means; his liability can not be held liable for damages resulting from the use of the Internet such as data loss, intrusion, viruses, break service, or other unintended problems.

Intellectual property

All elements of the site “www.phosphenism.com” are and remain the exclusive intellectual property of “PHOSPHENISM Publishing, Dr. Lefebure’s School, 30330 La Bastide d’Engras – FRANCE”.
Nobody is allowed to reproduce, use, repost, or use for any purpose whatsoever, even partially, elements of the site wether software, visual or sound.

Any use of single link or hyperlink is strictly prohibited without the express written consent of “PHOSPHENISM Publishing – School of Dr Lefebure, 30330 La Bastide d’Engras – FRANCE”.

Personal datas

According to the French law relating to datas, files and freedoms of January 6, 1978, information like the name or other data of the buyers may be subject to automated processing. “PHOSPHENISM Publishing, 30330 La Bastide d’Engras – FRANCE” reserves the right to collect information on purchasers including by using cookies, and, if desired, to transmit to business partners the collected information.

Buyers may object to the disclosure of their details by notifying it to the Publisher. Similarly, users have a right to access and correct data concerning them, according to the law of January 6, 1978. The processing of information, including management of email addresses of site users has been declared to the CNIL under the number recorded  N° CNIL: 623459.

Proof

“PHOSPHENISM Publishing – Dr. Lefebure’s School, 30330 La Bastide d’Engras – FRANCE” archive purchase orders and invoices on a reliable and durable backup media as a true copy in accordance with article 1348 of the French Civil Code. The records “PHOSPHENISM Publishing – Dr. Lefebure’s School, 30330 La Bastide d’Engras – FRANCE” will be considered by the parties as proof of communications, orders, payments and transactions between the parties.

Settlement of disputes

These online terms of sale are subject to French law. In case of dispute, jurisdiction is given to the competent courts of the headquarters of PHOSPHENISM Publishing, despite multiple defendants or warranty.
PHOSPHENISM Publishing – School of Dr Lefebure, August 1, 2016, 30330 La Bastide d’Engras – FRANCE
